sentences.english: However, soon after that, she has a relapse of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 但是不久，滴發現她的乳癌居然復發。

sentences.english: Hereditary breast cancer commonly occurs in premenopausal women.
sentences.chinese: 遺傳性乳癌通常發生於絕經前婦女。

sentences.english: Women are prone to breast cancer, so they need regular checkups.
sentences.chinese: 女人容易罹患乳癌，所以他們需要定期檢查。

sentences.english: Dioxin chemicals causes cancer, especially breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 戴奧辛之化學物質會導致癌症，尤其是乳癌。

sentences.english: Also in our October issue, we journey with tennis legend Martina Navratilova as she battles her way back from breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 十月號還將與網壇傳奇娜拉奇諾娃一起對抗乳癌。

sentences.english: It is necessary and viable to preserve ICBN during axillary node clearance for carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 乳癌腋清掃術中保留ICBN是必要和可行的。

sentences.english: In the semiotics of breast cancer, surgery means malignancy.
sentences.chinese: 就乳癌的症狀來說，手術意味着腫瘤是惡性的。

sentences.english: I have * cancer.I found out a few weeks ago.
sentences.chinese: 我得了乳癌，我也是在幾周前才知道。

sentences.english: Breast cancer metastasizing to composite pheochromocytoma is still rarer.
sentences.chinese: 乳癌轉移至混合嗜鉻性細胞瘤更是少見。

sentences.english: Should she give up the baby and concentrate on medical treatment?
sentences.chinese: 她應該放棄小孩而接受乳癌化學治療？

sentences.english: She was 34 when she discovered her stage-4 breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 發現自己患有4期乳癌時，她當時34歲。

sentences.english: Conclusions Digital mammography-guided biopsy possesses great clinical practical value to the diagnosis of early stage breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 結論計算機活檢法對早期乳癌診斷有很大實用價值。

sentences.english: Women with an average risk of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 具有一般乳癌風險的婦女。

sentences.english: Johnson's wife, Stacey, learned she had breast cancer four years ago.
sentences.chinese: 強森的妻子斯苔熙四年前得知自己患有乳癌。

sentences.english: In the past ten years of her marriage, she hasn′t expected a baby because of breast cancer when she was young.
sentences.chinese: 因爲以往曾經罹患乳癌，她早已死心放棄生孩子了。

sentences.english: The best way to beat breast cancer is early detection.
sentences.chinese: 戰勝乳癌的最佳方法就是及早發現癌腫。

definition: to suffer (from an illness)/to fall ill

pinyin: di4 er4 xing2 tang2 niao4 bing4
